biotools.summary: HARSH (HAplotype inference using Reference and Sequencing tecHnology) is a method to infer the haplotype using haplotype reference panel and high throughput sequencing data. It is based on a novel probabilistic model and Gibbs sampler method.

bioschemas.name: HARSH
bioschemas.summary: HARSH (HAplotype inference using Reference and Sequencing tecHnology) is a method to infer the haplotype using haplotype reference panel and high throughput sequencing data. It is based on a novel probabilistic model and Gibbs sampler method.
